mods.note: Subject SYSTEM OF WAT3R SUPPLY. f r = Previous References. MICROFILMED DOCUMENT DO NOT PHOTOCOPY USE Later References. S • 97. MGIPC—SI-18W(CPe)DCF-{fl.ll3C|-7*4-32-4O l D0O.I

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains an exchange of letters between the president of the Manama municipality and the Political agent in Bahrain. The exchange pertains the president's suggestion to introduce a water distribution system for Manama.

name.namePart: Government of Bahrain, Āl Khalīfa dynasty
